active_task_state.query: can you go to chipotle.com then go to the menu and build me a bowl with the following ingredients: chicken, white rice, black beans, fajita veggies, corn salsa, cheese, and lettuce. Submit the order. After that name the order "Sean" and submit it again. Then review the cart.
task_plan: Navigate to the menu section on chipotle.com.
Choose chicken as the protein option.
Add white rice to the bowl.
Add black beans to the bowl.
Add fajita veggies to the bowl.
Add corn salsa to the bowl.
Add the completed bowl to the cart and submit the order.
Create a new order and build the same bowl again with the specified ingredients.
Name this second order 'Sean' and submit it.
Review the cart to confirm both orders are present.
